thread.title: A Pleasant Stay - Review
thread.title_full: A Pleasant Stay - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: 351johan
title: A Pleasant Stay - Review
text: You can't go wrong booking The Stellenbosh Hotel. Located in a lovely part of Stellenbosh surrounded by great cafes and restaurants. I stayed three nights on a business trip. Staff very friendly and helpful. Excellent WiFi at all times for as many devices you need. The Stellenbosh Kitchen is part of the hotel offering great food all day. I will definitely stay again on my next trip.
